name: fso-2022-part3-server
description: Implementing a simple REST API in Node.js using Express, storing App data in a MongoDB database and deploying App to the internet

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../Full-Stack-Open-2022/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../FSO-2022-part3-server
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Matt Sanchez
